effects.display_string: Set: Free Spinning Crane Kicks grant Blackout Reinforcement, increasing the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 250%. Melee abilities have a chance to grant Blackout Reinforcement.

Set: Blackout Reinforcement empowered Blackout Kicks reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury, Rising Sun Kick, Strike of the Windlord, and Whirling Dragon Punch by 3.0 sec. 
Damage of Fists of Fury, Rising Sun Kick, Strike of the Windlord, and Whirling Dragon Punch increased by 4%.

spells.description:
Equip: The thorns feed off your vitality, reducing Stamina by 159. Your spells and abilities have a chance to launch magical thorns at your target, healing allies for 40,156 or striking enemies for 24,093 Nature damage.

These effects are increased by 100% if you equip an item crafted with a Toxified Armor Patch.

name: Signet of the Last Elder
description: Having endlessly stoked the fires of their hatred, Igira led the djaradin only to ruin.

spells.description: Use: Draw a set of aqueous spheres towards you that envelop you on contact, increasing your Mastery by 1,962 for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Plunge a twisted blade into your target, dealing 110,657 Physical damage. After 3 sec, the blade ignites with Shadowflame and returns to you, dealing 271,109 Shadowflame damage split between the target and all enemies in its path.

Damage increased per enemy struck, up to 5. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to draw on the corruption within, dealing an additional 32,660 Shadowflame damage to you and your target.

Damage increased by 400% against enemies above 90% health.
